# Capstone Notebook

Capstone project for the Master of Data Science program at the University of British Columbia.

To create this document, navigate to the notebook directory in R, and run the following code:

```r
bookdown::render_book('index.Rmd', 'all')
```

To recreate Rd files from the source code, use the following command in R:

```r
roxygen2::roxygenise(clean = TRUE)
```
